alert.note: Alert for South Central Utah (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 14 at 2:31PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Garfield County through 315 PM MDT... At 231 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 14 miles southeast of Escalante, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Boulder. This includes Utah Route 12 between mile markers 65 and 85. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
